transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello ma'am, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji aa rahi hai, batao.
Executive: Hello. IndiaMART. Ma'am, main IndiaMART se Meenakshi bol rahi hu. Aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, kar rahi hai but bahut kar rahi hai aawaz.
Executive: Ab aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, haan aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ma'am, main Meenakshi bol rahi hu IndiaMART se. Abhi aapke office se mujhe isi naam se call kar baat kar rahe the. Unhone bola ki unko business mil raha hai IndiaMART se, unko mahine ho gaye hai.
Customer: Mahine, do mahine nahi madam, char mahine hi ho gaye hai. Humko bhi pata hi nahi hai.
Executive: Toh ma'am, abhi sir se baat ho rahi thi, sir se sorry na. Mujhe laga aapke paas toh hoga record, char mahine ho gaye.
Executive: Ma'am, matlab main yeh keh rahi thi ki baat karte karte phone cut gaya tha aur unhone IndiaMART ke customer care pe call kiya hai. Maine isiliye call kiya hai ki unko agar customer care pe call aayi hai, problem hai toh main solution ke liye call kar rahi thi. Agar aap mujhe allow kare toh main video call ka link bola unhone ki video call ki link share karo. Maine share kiya tab tak call cut gayi. Tab se call kar rahi hu.
Customer: Thoda disturb ho gayi thi.
Executive: Haan, ma'am, baat kara sakte ho sir se aap ki aapko karna hai?
Customer: Nahi, koi nahi, aap mujhe hi bata do.
Executive: Ma'am, please check email ID pe please join kar lijiye.
Customer: Ma'am, main evening mein karu, abhi busy hu main.
Executive: Ma'am, abhi aap logo ne request kari hai toh ma'am mere ko bhi zyada time nahi lagega ki main aapka video call ek ghante ka stretch karungi. Mere ko bhi pata hai ma'am, mere ko 10 to 15, 10 to 15 minutes lagega ma'am.
Customer: Achha, theek hai, main abhi mere ko bhej do aap theek hai.
Executive: Maine aapko bheja hua hai ma'am, aap call disconnect mat kijiye, please join kijiye. San is part renewal service@gmail.com pe bheja hai.
Customer: Main bhejta hu.
Executive: Meenakshi ke naam se calendar aaya hoga aapko.
Customer: Meenakshi ke naam se thoda sa toh.
Customer: Aa rakha hai.
Executive: Aaya aaya hai na? Usko open kijiye.
Customer: Join karu?
Executive: Haan, haan usme already join hua, aap join kariye.
Customer: Theek hai.
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Ma'am aap jis
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says they are not getting business.

- Customer says it has been four months.

- Wants executive to tell her the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video call to resolve issue.

- Executive sent a video call link to customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join the video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video call, subscription
